name: phovea_ui
description: Wrapper for integration of Bootstrap and FontAwesome along with a common header for Phovea apps

scripts.copy: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-styles
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.copy-assets: if [ -d src/assets ]; then shx --verbose cp -R src/assets/. dist/assets/; fi && if [ -d src/template ]; then shx --verbose cp -R src/template/. dist/template/; fi
scripts.copy-styles: if [ -d src/scss ]; then shx --verbose cp -R src/scss/. dist/scss/; fi
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.predist: npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.dist: mkdir lib && cd dist && tar cvzf ../lib/phovea_ui.tar.gz *
